tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Sincere Thanks to Dr. Priya for making the delivery process a memorable one. Considering my Rh-ve case, Dr. Priya took almost care of the situation and made sure everything was followed for a safe procedure. I thank the hospital staff for providing one of the best services one could imagine and also being very supportive during the delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to Dr. Priya in the 5th month of my wife pregnancy's. Had a relocation thus we were bit uncomfortable to change the doctor initially. Maam, went through case history and all test reports in detail. She discussed and suggested all the do's and dont's very well. Must say Ma'am is very polite , humble and treat patient patiently. Faced some last minute complication in delivery, but Ma'am handled the case very professionally

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr Priya for my first pregnancy journey. *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ******* ** ** ***** Such a down to earth person she is ! Her approachable, friendly nature and the way she explains each and every aspect is remarkable and helps in creating a comfort zone. I Infect felt a motherly affection and care through her actions and words. Her expertise, compassion, patience and commitment helped a lot during my pregnancy period. Whenever there was an emergency her right decision's and care helped me deliver a healthy baby girl.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Priya is an exceptional obstetrician who provided me with great care during my pregnancy. She dedicated her time to ensure that all our questions were thoroughly answered in each consultation. Her expertise was invaluable in managing my low hemoglobin levels towards the end of my pregnancy.

I'm very thankful and grateful to have her as my doctor specially for her support and dedication during my labor, which extended beyond 24 hours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I got my wife  delivery and pregnancy treatment done
by dr Priya and blessed with a beautiful princess.
My pregnancy was very joyful and stressfree ,and
all the credit goes to dr priya and her whole team.
Thighly recommend her for pregnancy and post
Pregnancy care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We would like to share our experience with Dr priya. She has been a great support throughout pregnancy. She always guided towards right direction on how to maintain good health, excercise and moral support. I would say without her guidance our pregnancy pregnancy period is incomplete as she cared us like her daughter

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is so friendly and will describe your current
state of health precisely and politely. Very much
satisfied with her treatment especially during
operation. We opted for C section she advised us
to go for normal but we had our decision. She was
on time at OT and the whole operation was so
smooth that my wife did not have any issue at all.
Neither pre-op nor post-op. Lots of thanks to you
Priya ma'am. I recommend you ppl to go and
consult with Dr. Priya without any doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I cannot speak highly enough about Dr. Priya Agarwal. Throughout my entire pregnancy journey, she exhibited an exceptional level of care, compassion, and support. From the very first appointment to the delivery of my baby, Dr. Priya was always available to address my concerns and answer my questions, no matter how trivial they seemed. What truly set her apart was her genuine concern for my well-being

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very patient doctor who listens to your issues and explains everything very well. That is all that counts for a  woman. Initially I went to her for my routine check ups followed by my treatment for pcod. She has always addressed all my queries very well. Throughout my pregnancy journey she has been a great doctor. In today's world of csecs she made me believe that if no complication I can go for normal delivery too and she made that possible
